dcterms:creator: Diederik P Kingma
Max Welling
dcterms:description: A widely used benchmark dataset for evaluating recommender systems, containing 1,000,209 ratings by 6,040 users on 3,900 movies from 18 categories such as Action, Comedy, and Romance.
dcterms:title: MovieLens

dcterms:creator: Carl Yang
Lanxiao Bai
Chao Zhang

Jiawei Han
dcterms:description: A dataset collected from a real-world location-based social network, containing records of occurrence time, GPS location, and corresponding user ID, supplemented with categories.
dcterms:title: Gowalla
